title: A TIME IN SPACE 2 VR CARDBOARD
summary: For all VR Space Lover ! Discover the part 2 !!!
description: NEW ANNIVERSARY VERSION !You liked our first version ? you will loved the second part !!!!!With many More sensations ! We have put all our heart to make you live a wonderfull moment in space.Now We are proud to present you the sequel of A TIME IN SPACE ! IMPORTANT : If you have a trouble with the vision like a double vision, please try to set your headset by simply scanning a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/We have make the choice of performance on each phone instead the compatibility, so you will certainly need to configure your headset before launch the app.Note : we have test our app thousand times but we can't assure best performance for all device, so please try our Free version before for know if it's working on your Phone. If you have any trouble please contact our support.Enjoy Enjoy Enjoy !NO CONTROLLER NEEDED !Compatible with all VR Headset : - Cardboard- Homido- Virtual Vizor- FreeFly- VRBox....TIPS : For have the better result, please follow this some rule1/ Be sure you have enought Space for Download the App (200 Mo)+2/ Be sure you don't run too many app at the same time for have 500 RAM available.3/ If you have a double vision issue please scan a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/4/ For samsung Gear VR please donwload this app before : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kunkunsoft.cardboardappforgearvrNo Work on MOTO G but it's excellent on MOTO X !
descriptionHTML:
NEW ANNIVERSARY VERSION !

You liked our first version ? you will loved the second part !!!!!

With many More sensations ! We have put all our heart to make you live a wonderfull moment in space.

Now We are proud to present you the sequel of A TIME IN SPACE !

IMPORTANT : If you have a trouble with the vision like a double vision, please try to set your headset by simply scanning a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/

We have make the choice of performance on each phone instead the compatibility, so you will certainly need to configure your headset before launch the app.

Note : we have test our app thousand times but we can't assure best performance for all device, so please try our Free version before for know if it's working on your Phone. If you have any trouble please contact our support.

Enjoy Enjoy Enjoy !

NO CONTROLLER NEEDED !

Compatible with all VR Headset :
- Cardboard
- Homido
- Virtual Vizor
- FreeFly
- VRBox
....

TIPS : For have the better result, please follow this some rule
1/ Be sure you have enought Space for Download the App (200 Mo)+
2/ Be sure you don't run too many app at the same time for have 500 RAM available.
3/ If you have a double vision issue please scan a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/
4/ For samsung Gear VR please donwload this app before : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kunkunsoft.cardboardappforgearvr

No Work on MOTO G but it's excellent on MOTO X !
comments: A perfect VR experience. Update: I have a new phone and downloaded the latest version of this and I am even more impressed, as there's now more content and even better visual.  Interesting areas of traveral. The bonus game made me feel sick though. Much better than the original. Worth the money.

Wonderful...only one thing I'd change. Loved it! I wish I could easily go from the first to the second. As it is now, I have to remove my phone, close the first one and then open the second. An easy transition would truly make this the best. My 8 year old son loves this. I can't wait for the third.

Very good Very nice work guys nice little journey for a tiny amount of money considering the amount of hours that goes into development of these projects.  Can't see where to donate to assist further projects.  Thank you Rob
Pearl in the sea of mediocrity Again these people shown what the quality is!!! Good job Creanet, keep it this way and you will be the stars people ;)

ðŸ‘ŽðŸ‘Ž So still no new content after purchase. The asteroid game is not gonna cut it. Great for what it is a game trailer then a to be continued after that but looks to be good but the developers are as#holes so I don't expect much from it.... And to the developers I will gladly take my 99c refund and play the free version so make it happen
Truly immersive! What a wonderful concept! Dying for the third part. How soon is the third part gonna be out? Definitely gonna donate. Is there any date set for the release of the third part?
